description:
"Fun to Learn!"

You get how to make a phrase or sentences with some words.

Through creating simple sentences, you will gain an understanding of grammar and common usages.

You will be able to practice Japanese pronunciation and speaking tempo. 

All sentences are written in both Japanese and English to help with comprehension.

By using a simple, animal theme, you can really focus on learning the language. No other distractions! 

You can also supplement your learning from this course in many creative, non-expensive ways.

The best way to master a language is "mimic".

After you finish this course, you will have a solid fundamental understanding of the Japanese language. You’ll also be equipped with additional resources to take your Japanese to the next level.

You already have potential to master Japanese.

Let's get started now!
title: Learn Japanese with Nakamoto-sensei
